fieldUpdates.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Priority, "MP - Standard") , CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 6 ), 7 ), 0, TODAY() + 19, TODAY() + 21 ),IF(ISPICKVAL(Priority, "Individual - Standard") , CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 6 ), 7 ), 0, TODAY() + 26, TODAY() + 28 ),null))

rules.fullName: Append Carriage Number to Case Description
rules.description: Append Carriage Number entered for trains to Case Description.

rules.fullName: Assign Case TO GIS Admin Queue
rules.description: If Signatory on the case is Chief Executive, Roads and Maritime Services then the case will be assigned to the GIS Admin queue.

rules.fullName: Assign Pre-Reg Case TO GIS Admin Queue
rules.description: If Signatory on the case is Chief Executive, Roads and Maritime Services then the case will be assigned to the GIS Admin queue.
Updating case status to Completed when signed digitally. Assumes when case is signed digitally and emailed to customer, case status is updated as 'Signed and Emailed'
On case insert or update, Copy value of 'Issue Type' to 'Initial Type Submitted' if 'Initial Type Submitted' has not been populated.
rules.formula: AND(ISBLANK( Initial_Type_Submitted__c), NOT(ISBLANK((TEXT(Type)))) )

rules.description: If Case Owner role or Case Queue pertains to Serco, update "Serco Handled" checkbox on Case.
rules.formula: (Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Serco') || (Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Serco_CSA') || (Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Serco_Restricted_CSA') || (Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Serco_Level_2_CFM') || (Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Serco_Web_Triage_CFM')

rules.fullName: Case Owner Has Changed from User to Queue
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(OwnerId) && !ISBLANK(Owner:Queue.QueueName) && LEFT(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId),3) = '005' /*005 is prefix for user */
ISCHANGED(Status) && (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE (Status),"Re-assigned"))

rules.fullName: Change Owner to CRGS when Ready For Printing
Change Record Type to Private Operator

criteriaItems.value: ,QCity,Dions,Blue Mountains,Busabout,Busways Blacktown,Busways Central Coast,Hillsbus,Forest Coach,Hunter Valley,Interline Bus,Punchbowl Bus,Transdev,Coastal,Red,Port Stephens,Rover,Surfside,Ogdens,Forster,Cavanaghs,Ballina,Osborn,Tamworth,Transit Systems

rules.fullName: Change Record Type to Private Operator - Phase 2 operators
Change Record Type to Private Operator - Phase 2 operators Second WF Rule

rules.description: This workflow will trigger a time based field update depending upon the no of days case can be reopened after it has been marked as Resolved

rules.fullName: Close Case depending upon Response Type
rules.description: Case status should update to close if Response Type is No response required (NRR).
rules.formula: PRIORVALUE(Response_Type__c) != "No response required (NRR)" && ISPICKVAL( Response_Type__c ,"No response required (NRR)") && IsMinCorroCase__c && (TEXT(Origin) != "Web" && TEXT(Origin_Details__c) != "Roads Webform" && TEXT(Origin_Details__c) != "Transport Webform")

rules.fullName: Close Child Cases For MAGS When Created
rules.description: This workflow will close all the child cases created using Taxanomy UI
rules.formula: AND( ParentId <> null, ISPICKVAL(Parent.Modes__c, "Multi Issue"), IsMinCorroCase__c )

rules.description: Add prefix to CaseNumber and stamp on External ID field Case_Reference_Number__c

rules.fullName: E2C - send email response for Feedback Passthrough

rules.description:
This workflow will send out an email notification to LRO whenever case owner is changed to "Light Rail"
DEACTIVATE THIS WORKFLOW WHILE BULK UPLOAD OF THE CASES
rules.formula: CONTAINS(Owner:Queue.QueueName,"Light Rail") && NOT(ISBLANK(PBLROperator_Email_Address__c))

rules.description:
This workflow will send out an email notification to PBO whenever case owner is changed to "Private Bus Queue"
DEACTIVATE THIS WORKFLOW WHILE BULK UPLOAD OF THE CASES
rules.formula: CONTAINS(Owner:Queue.QueueName,"Private Bus") && NOT(ISBLANK(PBLROperator_Email_Address__c))

rules.fullName: Email Notification To PBO%2FLRO New Case Comment
rules.description: Email notification will be send to a case owner when new case comment is added on PBO/LRO cases by user other the case owner i.e. Serco Agent

rules.fullName: Email Notification of Excused Performance incidents to Corporate Customer Relations
rules.description: Email Notification of Excused Performance incidents to Corporate Customer Relations

rules.fullName: Email Notification of Vexatious Customer to Corporate Customer Relations
rules.description: Email Notification of Vexatious Customer to Corporate Customer Relations

rules.fullName: Flip Case record type to Roads Freight Min Corro
rules.description: Whenever RMS CE Case is sent back to Sr. Mags allocation queue then case record type will be changed to Roads and Freight Min Corro.
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(OwnerId) && RecordType.DeveloperName == "RMS_CE_Signatory" && ( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName == "Senior_MAGS_Officer_Queue_MC" || CONTAINS(Owner:User.UserRole.Name ,"MAGS") )

rules.fullName: Flip Case record type to Roads and Freight
rules.description: Will flip the record type to Roads & Freight Ministerial Correspondence based on the corresponding Ministerial directed to being selected.

rules.fullName: Flip Case record type to Secretary Min Corro
rules.description: Will flip the record type to Office of Secretary Ministerial Correspondence based on the corresponding portfolio being selected.

rules.fullName: Flip Case record type to Transport Min Corro
rules.description: Will flip the record type to Transport Ministerial Correspondence based on the corresponding Ministerial directed to being selected.

rules.fullName: Flip Case record type to WestConnex Ministerial Correspondence
rules.description: Will flip the record type to WestConnex Ministerial Correspondence based on the corresponding portfolio selected.

rules.formula: ISCHANGED(OwnerId) && RecordType.DeveloperName != "Metro" && Owner:Queue.DeveloperName == "Sydney_Metro_Customer_Relations"

rules.booleanFilter: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND 4 AND (5 OR 6) and 7
rules.description: For Partial Referral, there needs to be way to close cases were partial referrals are completed versus those worked. It was requested once response type = Partial Referral and all Referees referred, that case status is updated to Referral Completed

rules.booleanFilter: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 8) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.description: For Partial Referral, there needs to be way to track cases were partial referrals are worked versus those completed. It was requested once response type = Partial Referral and case is MO approved that case status is updated to Referral Pending

rules.fullName: Min Corro %3A Copy Contact address details on the case
rules.description: Update Contact Address details whenever the record is edited.
rules.formula: AND(IsMinCorroCase__c, OR( ISCHANGED(ContactId), AND( ISBLANK(Contact_City__c), ISBLANK(Contact_Post_Code__c), ISBLANK(Contact_State__c), ISBLANK(Contact_Street__c), ISBLANK(Contact_Email__c) ) ) )

rules.fullName: Min Corro %3A Copy OBO Contact details on the case
rules.description: Update OBO Address details whenever the record is edited.
rules.formula: AND(IsMinCorroCase__c, OR( ISCHANGED(OBO__c), AND( ISBLANK(OBO_City__c), ISBLANK(OBO_Email__c), ISBLANK(OBO_Post_Code__c), ISBLANK(OBO_State__c) , ISBLANK(OBO_Street__c) ) ) )

rules.fullName: Min Corro %3A Populate registered by Name
rules.description: Name of the user who registered the case

rules.fullName: Min Corro%3A Populate Registered By User
New Case%3A Send Email Alert for Owner

criteriaItems.value: Concession - Concessions,Concession - School Drive Subsidy,Concession - SSTS,Concession - Replacement of TCEC

rules.description: This workflow should only be triggered on create. It is designed to send an email alert when a new case is created for any owners in the criteria. This is created for Concession team.

rules.fullName: New Case%3A Send Email Alert to Sydney Metro Case Owner
rules.description: Inform Sydney Metro Case Owner that a new Case has been assigned to him/her.
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(OwnerId) && CONTAINS(Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName, 'North_West_Rail_Link') && LEFT(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId),3) = '005' /*005 is prefix for user */

rules.fullName: Notify Queue Member - New Case Creation
rules.description: For Office of Secretary - Workflow Rule to avoid other emails.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Office_of_the_Secretary_DLO_Queue' )

rules.fullName: Notify Queue Member - New Case Creation Secretary Queue
rules.description: For Office of Secretary - Workflow Rule to avoid other emails and inform for new case creation.
rules.formula: Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Office_of_the_Secretary_DLO_Queue' && Is_Secretary_Notified__c!=true

rules.description: Number of categorisation changes
rules.formula: AND(OR( ISCHANGED(Taxonomy_Moment__c), ISCHANGED(Taxonomy_Location_Type__c), ISCHANGED( Taxonomy_Transaction__c ), ISCHANGED( Taxonomy_Symptom__c ), ISCHANGED( Taxonomy_Area__c ), ISCHANGED( Taxonomy_Location__c ) ),(CreatedDate <> LastModifiedDate) )

rules.fullName: Origin Phone and User Serco then set Origin Details -131500
rules.description: If Origin = Phone and User Role starts with Serco - Origin Details = 131500

rules.fullName: Populate Recipient for High Priority Sydney Train Cases
rules.description: Populate Recipient for High Priority Sydney Train Cases

rules.fullName: RMS Update Responsible Party to SNSW
rules.description: Update Responsible Party to SNSW as per Taxonomy configuration
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'CFM API') && ISPICKVAL(Responsible_Party__c, '') && (Taxonomy_Symptom_Id__c != null && (Taxonomy_Symptom_Id__r.Parent_Id__r.Auto_Share_With_SNSW__c || Taxonomy_Symptom_Id__r.Auto_Share_With_SNSW__c))

rules.fullName: RMS Web Case Created By CFM API
rules.description: This workflow updates case status to Received when RMS creates case by CFM API
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Origin_Details__c,'RMS Website'), ISPICKVAL(Origin,'CFM API'), NOT(IsMinCorroCase__c), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Received')), Taxonomy_Symptom_Id__c != null , Taxonomy_Symptom_Id__r.Parent_Id__r.Auto_Share_With_SNSW__c=false, Taxonomy_Symptom_Id__r.Auto_Share_With_SNSW__c=false )

(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Private_Operators' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Light_Rail' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'On_Demand' )&& AND( ISCHANGED( Status ), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Re-assigned" ) )

rules.fullName: Remove values in Other Signatory if a Signatory is selected

rules.description: Fires when the case status changes from soft close to a status other than hard closed
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Status) && TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status)) = 'Closed' && !ISPICKVAL(Status,'Finalised') && IF(ISBLANK(Owner:Queue.QueueName), true, Owner:Queue.QueueName != 'SNSW Holding')

rules.description: resets the skip validation flag that is used to note names that are used by triggers to denote which validation is to be skipped and validation rules refer it to not impose themselves
When response Type is No response required (NRR) and not a CE Case.
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL( Status ,"Closed - NRR") && IsMinCorroCase__c && RecordTypeName__c <> "RMS CE Signatory" && RecordTypeName__c <> "Office of the Secretary Correspondence" && RecordTypeName__c <> "Roads & Freight Ministerial Correspondence" && RecordTypeName__c <> "Transport Ministerial Correspondence" && RecordTypeName__c <> "General Ministerial Correspondence"

rules.fullName: Send alert to Syd Trains Managers for new cases created from closed
rules.description: Send email to the following users if a case has been created from a customer reply to a closed case.

rules.fullName: Send case comment notification from SNSW

rules.description: this workflow if responsible for sending referral to SNSW when agency on case is stamped as SNSW

rules.fullName: Set %27Signature Authorisation Failure%27 and %27Signature Review Completed%27 to default value
rules.description: Set 'Signature Authorisation Failure' to checked and 'Signature Review Completed' to unchecked.
rules.formula: AND( IsClosed = false, IsMinCorroCase__c = true, OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'General_Ministerial_Correspondence', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Office_of_the_Secretary_Ministerial_Correspondence', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Roads_Freight_Ministerial_Correspondence', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Transport_Ministerial_Correspondence') )

rules.fullName: Set Date First Awaiting MO Contact Approval
rules.description: Sets Date First Awaiting MO Contact Approval timestamp
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting MO Contact Approval'), ISBLANK( Date_First_Awaiting_MO_Contact_Approval__c ) )

rules.description: Sets Date First Awaiting Signature timestamp
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Signature'), ISBLANK( Date_First_Awaiting_Signature__c ) )

rules.fullName: Set Date First Ready for Printing
rules.description: Sets Date First Ready for Printing timestamp
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Ready For Printing'), ISBLANK( Date_First_Ready_for_Printing__c ) )

rules.description: This workflow rule is to set due date of response when case status is updated to Allocation and due date is not present on the case. Deactivated since this logic in covered in apex class which takes public holidays in consideration.
rules.formula: (OR(ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'MP - Standard'), ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Individual - Standard')) && ISBLANK( Due_date__c ) && (ISCHANGED( Status ) && ISPICKVAL( Status, 'Allocation')) || (ISCHANGED( Priority ) && ISPICKVAL( Status, 'Allocation')))

rules.fullName: Set Response Due Date - RMS Registration Scenario
rules.description: This workflow rule is to set due date of response when a RMS CE Signatory case is updated to Registration and due date is not present on the case. Deactivated since this logic in covered in apex class which takes public holidays in consideration.
rules.formula: (OR(ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'MP - Standard'), ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Individual - Standard')) && ISBLANK( Due_date__c ) && ISCHANGED( Status ) && ISPICKVAL( Status, 'Registration') && ISPICKVAL( Signatory__c , 'Chief Executive, Roads and Maritime Services') && (ISPICKVAL( Origin , 'Email') || ISPICKVAL( Origin , 'Letter'))) || ((ISCHANGED( Priority ) && ISPICKVAL( Status, 'Registration') && ISPICKVAL( Signatory__c , 'Chief Executive, Roads and Maritime Services')) && (ISPICKVAL( Origin , 'Email') || ISPICKVAL( Origin , 'Letter')))

rules.description: This workflow will stamp the correct agency for NSW Trains
This workflow will stamp the correct agency for Serco
This workflow will stamp the correct agency for Sydney Trains

rules.fullName: Stamp Date Draft Response in Progress

rules.description: SFCOE-2089: Capturing the date the status changes to Allocation for the first time

a workflow rule that fires off when record is created or updated to match criteria (owner begins with RMS*) - use RegEx to extract Branch name from the queue and set the Branch attribute to this value (note Queue is in the format RMS_<division name>_<bran
stamps date assigned to agency on case if case owner is other than serco user
rules.formula: IF(AND( NOT(IsMinCorroCase__c), ISBLANK(Date_Assigned_to_Agency__c), OR( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'New'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Triage')), AND(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName != 'Serco_Web_Triage_CFM', Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName != 'Serco', Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName != 'Serco_CSA', Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName != 'Serco_Restricted_CSA' )), true, false)

rules.fullName: Sydney Metro Cases - Email Notification for New Case Assignment
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(OwnerId) && LEFT(OwnerId,3) = '005' && Record_Type_Dev_Name__c = 'Metro'

rules.description: Sydney Trains - Send High Priority Email Notifications (Agency is Sydney Trains and Priority is High)

rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), Owner:Queue.DeveloperName != 'Office_of_the_Secretary_DLO_Queue' )

rules.fullName: Unsubstantiated Case Notification To Depot Manager
rules.description: Email Notification of Unsubstantiated Customer to Depot Manager
Amendment will be set to false if the case status is changed to Ready for printing

rules.fullName: Update Case Manager Role when case is closed
rules.description: SFCOE-2139: Used to capture the role of the case manager at the time when the case is closed. For reporting purposes. Field is used by RMS, but can be used by other agencies if this is helpful.
Update the field Contact_Made_Timestamp__c for PO record type when the status changes from Received to In Progress
rules.formula: RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Private_Operators' && Text(PRIORVALUE(Status)) = 'Received' && text(Status) = 'In Progress'

rules.description: Updates the priority to High for STA cases

rules.fullName: Update Record Type to Bus when Owner is STA
rules.description:
Fix for defect SFCOE-1002
Update the record type to Bus if Owner Agency is STA and Mode=Bus. This is to ensure that STA is able to "Close with Customer" for contract purposes.

rules.fullName: Update Status to MO Amend if new amendment
rules.description: If a new amendment is added to the case, update the status to MO Amend. (Assumes previous status is awaiting signature)
rules.formula: AND(Amendment__c,ISPICKVAL( Status , "Awaiting Signature") )

rules.fullName: Update agency to RMS for cases submitted by SNSW
Update case status to In Progress
rules.formula: AND(NOT( IsMinCorroCase__c ), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Received') , Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName != 'Serco', Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName != 'Serco_CSA', Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName != 'Serco_Restricted_CSA', LEFT(OwnerId,3) == "005" )

rules.description: this workflow updates case status to received on change of ownership to queue from a user.
rules.formula: AND(LEFT(OwnerId,3) <> "005" , NOT(IsMinCorroCase__c), Owner:Queue.DeveloperName != 'SNSW_Holding', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName != 'Serco_Web_Triage_CFM', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName != 'Serco_Level_2_CFM', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Received')))

rules.description: Workflow is responsible for updating case status to closed for the cases which are qualified for SNSW

rules.fullName: Update status to Triage for E2C

criteriaItems.value: Email - Live Traffic,Email - TMC,Email - HCF,Email - E2C

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8
rules.description: Sends an acknowledgement email when a case is created from the web

rules.fullName: Web Case Created By CFM API
rules.description: Sends an acknowledgement email when a case is created from the CFM API

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND (2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND (6 AND 7)
rules.description: Sends an acknowledgement email when a case is created from the web for SNSW

tasks.subject: Sent email to Light Rail Operator
